name: All-Natural No-Bake Cookies
author: KESSIANNE
summary: Choosing to avoid processed sugars doesn't have to mean suppressing cravings! This recipe totally satisfies my peanut butter cup cravings, but leaves me feeling full instead of slightly sick. Try maple syrup in place of honey for additional flavor. Enjoy!
directions: Combine honey, coconut oil, and cocoa powder in a small pot and bring to a boil; cook at a boil for 2 minutes and remove from heat
Stir oats, peanut butter, coconut, and vanilla extract into the hot honey mixture until the peanut butter melts and the mixture is smooth
Drop mixture by spoonful onto waxed paper
Set aside to cool until firm, about 20 minutes
